item.title: Pikabot Analysis
item.author: cr4ck3d
item.description: Executive Summary Pikabot used indirect syscalls to evade detection. Pikabot used RC4 for strings encryption/decryption. Pikabot used varouis anti-analysis techniques to slow down the analysis. Infection Chain The infection chain start with running a copy of the legitimate file for Windows Write (write.exe) that will side-loads malicious DLL named edputil.dll, then it will download the packed Pikabot DLL. after unpacking the Pikabot Loader will decrypt and inject the core module into the created process “ctfmon.
